data.expected_result: the link opens in your chosen browser
data.short_description: clicking on links in embeds  opens the link in safari rather than your chosen browser
data.steps_to_repro: - change settings to open with in app browser - paste a link with a embedded link, like this https://www.google.co.uk/amp/amp.crackberry.com/rare-blackberry-passport-silver-edition-running-android-goes-sale-kijiji - click the embedded link
